name: places/ChIJq31W-YtYwokR8DRknqQeXIQ
formattedAddress: 61 W 74th St #2, New York, NY 10023, USA
adrFormatAddress: 61 W 74th St #2, New York, NY 10023-2433, USA

originalText.text:
I have lived in the building above Columbus Valet Services now for over 5 years, and they have been doing my laundry weekly, the whole time. I have never gone anywhere else.

I cannot recommend them highly enough. They always speedily do a same day service, and fold the clothes all perfectly. Clothes always come back with a fresh clean smell too - no strong fragrance.

The service is also 5 star! The team know you quickly by name, and take great care of your clothes. They also offer a fantastic and fast dry cleaning service too - best in the area! They have an alterations service too, and again these guys have done my suit and clothing alterations for the last 5 years.

Top service, 5 star, friendly staff, best in the area! - all in all a pleasure to recommend them!

originalText.text: Can’t say enough great things about this place. Eli and Leo are great people who really care about doing their jobs well. Service is fast, affordable, friendly, and consistently great. These people make my life so much easier and I hope they stick around for the long haul.

text.text: Can’t say enough great things about this place. Eli and Leo are great people who really care about doing their jobs well. Service is fast, affordable, friendly, and consistently great. These people make my life so much easier and I hope they stick around for the long haul.

originalText.text: The only place on the UWS I trust for wash and fold! Three years with Columbus valet and they have never even lost a sock. Highly recommend. Fast and friendly service!

text.text: The only place on the UWS I trust for wash and fold! Three years with Columbus valet and they have never even lost a sock. Highly recommend. Fast and friendly service!

originalText.text: What a great dry cleaning and laundry store. The customer service was excellent and their prices are super reasonable. The man at the store was so friendly and helpful, highly recommend!

text.text: What a great dry cleaning and laundry store. The customer service was excellent and their prices are super reasonable. The man at the store was so friendly and helpful, highly recommend!

originalText.text: They do great work and are super nice folks.
